TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DataRelation extends System.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Editor("Microsoft.VSDesigner.Data.Design.DataRelationEditor, Microsoft.VSDesigner, Version=0.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.Drawing.Design.UITypeEditor, System.Drawing, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 表示两个 对象之间的父/子关系。

span.span: Represents a parent/child relationship between two objects.

remarks.format: ## Remarks A用于使两个相关对象通过相互对象。A is used to relate two objects to each other through objects. 例如，在客户/订单关系中，客户表为父表和 Orders 表是的子元素的关系。For example, in a Customer/Orders relationship, the Customers table is the parent and the Orders table is the child of the relationship. 这是类似于主键/外键关系。This is similar to a primary key/foreign key relationship. 有关详细信息，请参阅[导航 Datarelation](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datarelations.md)。For more information, see [Navigating DataRelations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/navigating-datarelations.md). 父和子表中的匹配列之间创建关系。Relationships are created between matching columns in the parent and child tables. 也就是说，这两个列必须是相同的值。That is, the value for both columns must be identical. 关系也可以级联从父各种变化到其子行。Relationships can also cascade various changes from the parent to its child rows. 若要控制如何子行中更改了值，添加到的对象。To control how values are changed in child rows, add a to the of the object. 确定要执行父表中的值时的操作是删除或更新。The determines what action to take when a value in a parent table is deleted or updated. 当是创建，则首先将验证是否可以建立关系。When a is created, it first verifies that the relationship can be established. 添加到后，通过禁止会使其失效的任何更改保留关系。After it is added to the , the relationship is maintained by disallowing any changes that would invalidate it. 之间的这段时被创建并添加到，则可能必须对父或子行所做的其他更改。Between the period when a is created and added to the , it is possible for additional changes to be made to the parent or child rows. 如果这导致一种关系，将不再有效，则会生成异常。An exception is generated if this causes a relationship that is no longer valid. > [!NOTE] > 如果两个表之间定义双向关系，则会发生数据损坏。Data corruption can occur if a bi-directional relation is defined between two tables. 双向关系包含两个`DataRelation`切换为父-子角色使用的相同列的对象。A bi-directional relation consists of two `DataRelation` objects that use the same columns, with the parent-child roles switched. 不会引发异常时`DataRelation`保存对象; 但是，可能会发生数据损坏。No exception is raised when the `DataRelation` objects are saved; however, data corruption can occur. 对象包含在，这可以通过访问属性，和和属性。 objects are contained in a , which you can access through the property of the , and the and properties of the . ## Examples 下面的示例创建一个新和将其添加到的。The following example creates a new and adds it to the of a . [!code-csharp[Classic WebData DataRelation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelation Example/CS/source.cs#1)] [!code-vb[Classic WebData DataRelation Example#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_ADO.NET/Classic WebData DataRelation Example/VB/source.vb#1)]

span.span: This type is safe for multithreaded read operations.

threadsafe.span: 你必须同步任何写入操作。

span.span: You must synchronize any write operations.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 你可以使用定义层次结构关系，例如那些在 XML 中指定的对象。You can use objects to define hierarchical relationships, such as those specified in XML. 有关详细信息，请参阅[嵌套 Datarelation](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/nesting-datarelations.md)。For more information, see [Nesting DataRelations](~/docs/framework/data/adonet/dataset-datatable-dataview/nesting-datarelations.md). > [!NOTE] > 如果关系中的子表的匹配的关系，在父表中的列属性必须为 false。If the of the child table in the relation matches the of a column in the parent table in the relation, the property must be false. 这不是与.NET Framework 1.0 版必需的。This was not required with the .NET Framework version 1.0.
